description: This file defines the ScriptService class responsible for creating and persisting test scripts associated with test cases, specifically for pytest and Playwright integrations.

classes.name: ScriptService
classes.description: A service class that handles the creation and storage of test scripts for test cases, providing methods to generate script files with appropriate naming conventions.

methods.name: None __init__(self, storage: StorageService | None = None)
methods.description: Initializes the ScriptService with an optional StorageService dependency.

methods.name: Tuple[str,str] write_script_for_test_case(self, test_case_id: int, test_case: Dict[str, Any], script_content: str)
methods.description: Generates and saves a test script file for a given test case, returning the file path and filename.

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, storage: StorageService | None = None) -> None:$/

ctags.name: write_script_for_test_case
ctags.pattern: /^    def write_script_for_test_case(self, test_case_id: int, test_case: Dict[str, Any], script_co/
ctags.signature: (self, test_case_id: int, test_case: Dict[str, Any], script_content: str)
